channel.title: Privacy Policy on Ahmedur Rahman Shovon
channel.description: Recent content in Privacy Policy on Ahmedur Rahman Shovon

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description:
It’s quite basic at the moment. We use the third-party, Google analytics and Google AdSense, which will likely collect information. But it’s worth reading their privacy policy for more information on that. Besides, these third parties, we don’t use cookies, store, or collect information.

Effective date

The effective date of this privacy policy is January 01, 2022.

External Usage

Our website may link to external sites that are not operated by us. Please be aware that we have no control over the content and practices of these sites, and cannot accept responsibility or liability for their respective privacy policies.
